full_summary:
# Tender Announcement: Bench and Portable Test Equipment

## Government Tender Announcement

**Tender Reference Number:** WS4472906414-Doc4541072672
**Solicitation Number:** WS4472906414
**Publication Date:** 2024-04-16
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-05-02, [14:00:00]

## Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of the Department of National Defence, is soliciting bids for the procurement of Bench and Portable Test Equipment. The equipment will be used to determine the elemental composition, chemistry, viscosity, fuel dilution, and ferrous properties of oils, fuels, greases, coolants, and process waters at the Fleet Maintenance Facility CAPE BRETON (FMF CB).

## Tender Details

* **Procurement Category:** Goods (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), and Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).
* **Regions of Delivery:** British Columbia

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact:
Oscar Slabicki 
Department of Public Works and Government Services 
(11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage) 
Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5 
[oscar.slabicki@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:oscar.slabicki@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
